content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --SCAT
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --SCAT
      operator: equal_to
      value: DOMAIN
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.44
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --SCAT is not null and --SCAT is equal to DOMAIN
Outcome:
  Message: --SCAT is equal to DOMAIN
  Output Variables:
    - --CAT
    - --SCAT
    - DOMAIN
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '44'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Values for --CAT and --SCAT should not be redundant
                  with the domain or dictionary classification provided by --DECOD
                  and --BODSYS.
                Document: IG v.3.1
                Section: 4.2.6
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when --SCAT is not null and --SCAT is equal to DOMAIN

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Values for --CAT and --SCAT should not be redundant with the domain or dictionary classification provided by --DECOD and --BODSYS.
